channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for TN

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found at the SWAK table wet from leaking Reagent Alcohol bottle. DescribePack: Failure occurred at the top of the content where there is a small puncture spot under the lid area DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in a spill kit and taken to QA to isolate and await processing

  • Description: SequenceEvent: PKG WAS DAMAGED DURING SORTATION. PLACED INSIDE A LINED HAZMAT TOTE INSIDE THE HAZMAT CAGE FOR EVAUATION DescribePack: PKG FOUND WET. CONTENT CAP WAS LOOSE AND PUNCTURED NEAR CAP WHICH CAUSED INTERNAL LEAKAGE. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: TURNED UPRIGHT AND CAP TIGHTENED

item.title: Report X-2023120812
item.description:
Report X-2023120812

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-05T18:16:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: LEBANON
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA discovered package in unload wet and took immediate action to mitigate the situation. Package was instantly placed into an appropriate spill tote and taken to be examined. DescribePack: Three of the 1-gallon containers of isopropyl alcohol had loose caps. The seal under the caps had also been torn allowing the contents to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA followed proper hazmat handling procedures to get the package out of unload without further release.

item.title: Report X-2023120869
item.description:
Report X-2023120869

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-13
  • City: NASHVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The wet package was removed from sort, placed in a tote with an absorbent pad, and brought to the HMPA for processing. DescribePack: The four bottles in the shipment all leaked from their caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The spillage was largely confined to the carton and tote. An absorbent pad was used to clean the tote after processing.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Sequence of events unknown due to lack of communication from sort in which incident happened. DescribePack: Package failed due to cap closure within box leaking. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package mitigation consisted of putting box in an open contents bin and leaving it for OB QA.

item.title: Report X-2023120873
item.description:
Report X-2023120873

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-03T15:12:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: MURFREESBORO
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023120873 SequenceEvent: Upon unloading of box it was found wet and leaking. It was placed in a tote and plastic bag to mitigate further leaking. Tote was then taken to the hazmat area for further investigation. DescribePack: Loose Cap on bottle and box was soaked and leaking. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Leaking box and its contents were placed in a plastic bag and then a tote to stop any further leaking. 2. X-2023120878 SequenceEvent: Upon unloading of the package it was discovered that the package was wet and leaking. It was placed in a plastic bag and then a tote to mitigate further leaking and taken to hazmat area for further investigation. DescribePack: Closures on bottle failed and causing leaking and box to get wet and tear. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic bag and then inside a tote to mitigate any further leakage.

item.title: Report E-2023120449
item.description:
Report E-2023120449

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-09
  • City: KNOXVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A hazardous spill of UN1814 "Nalstrip #2634" that arrived damaged at Terminal. The caller stated that (1) a 330-gallon plastic IBC tote was punctured by strapping braces on its pallet impacting Trailer and the area underneath the trailer. No Drains, soil or water way were impacted.

item.title: Report X-2023120882
item.description:
Report X-2023120882

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-02T15:11:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: NASHVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking hazmat package found on Big Unload 1AM 12/14. Package and spillage removed from operations, taken to HMPA in two lined totes. Please note that Ftrack shows delivery scan and no 63 / Relabel status code was applied; this may be a duplicate barcode. DescribePack: One 1 gallon plastic bottle lost 0.5 gallon of fluid from a 1 inch puncture to the top/side of container body near the handle. This was not following the seam. Puncture caused by impact from sharp object. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PPE donned and ventilation used.

item.title: Report X-2023121078
item.description:
Report X-2023121078

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-02T15:11:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-22
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Pkg Info ( TRK NBR=774200642190 PKG TYPE=Package (box/drum/jerrican/composite) PHY STATE=Liquid TRANSPORTATION PHASE=In Transit ) Commodity Info ( UNDG NBR=UN1268 CLASS=30 PSN TEXT=PETROLEUM DISTILLATES, N.O.S. PKG GRP=II SPILLED QTY=0 CONTAINER CAPACITY=1.1 CONTAINER UOM=Liquid - Liter MATERIAL CONSTRUCTION=A - Metal (any type) NUMBER IN SHIPMENT=1 NUMBER FAILED=0 INNER PKG TYPE=1 - Bottle TOTAL AMT IN EACH CONTAINER=1.1 TOTAL UOM=Liquid - Liter )Pkg Info ( TRK NBR=774200642190 PKG TYPE=Package (box/drum/jerrican/composite) PHY STATE=Liquid TRANSPORTATION PHASE=In Transit ) Commodity Info ( UNDG NBR=UN1593 CLASS=61 PSN TEXT=DICHLOROMETHANE PKG GRP=III SPILLED QTY=0 CONTAINER CAPACITY=0.004 CONTAINER UOM=Liquid - Liter MATERIAL CONSTRUCTION=B - Glass# porcelain# or stoneware NUMBER IN SHIPMENT=1 NUMBER FAILED=0 INNER PKG TYPE=1 - Bottle TOTAL AMT IN EACH CONTAINER=0.004 TOTAL UOM=Liquid - Liter )Pkg Info ( TRK NBR=774200642190 PKG TYPE=Package (box/drum/jerrican/composite) PHY STATE=Liquid TRANSPORTATION PHASE=In Transit ) Commodity Info ( UNDG NBR=UN1760 CLASS=80 PSN TEXT=CORROSIVE LIQUID, N.O.S. PKG GRP=III SPILLED QTY=0 CONTAINER CAPACITY=300 CONTAINER UOM=Liquid - Milliliter MATERIAL CONSTRUCTION=B - Glass# porcelain# or stoneware NUMBER IN SHIPMENT=1 NUMBER FAILED=0 INNER PKG TYPE=1 - Bottle TOTAL AMT IN EACH CONTAINER=300 TOTAL UOM=Liquid - Liter )A fiberboard box with signs of release was found during sort operations at the MEMH facility. While investigating the shipment there were three glass bottles of petroleum distillates that had broken and spilled inside of the fiberboard box. All items inside were wrapped with bubble wrap and the inside of the fiberboard box was lined with plastic. The remaining contents were contained into a Steel Salvage Package. The shipper has been contacted for an amended Declaration and further disposition.
